title: Day Track
content:
The day track on the campaign tracker keeps track of how many days have passed during your campaign . At the end of each day, cross off that day on the day track. Each day has a “recommended weather” card listed underneath it to use during setup.

Many of the outcomes of different missions change based on how many days you take to complete them, and other elements of the story may change based on how much time has passed.

During step 6 of setup, read any entries listed over the current day. The campaign guide may instruct you to record entries above certain days based on your actions in the Valley.
